Name: Wormatozoa
About the game: Control parasitic worms through dangerous environments as they evolve from tiny parasites to city-engulfing monsters. Every threat kills you instantly, so precision and timing are critical for success. Features Fast-paced challenging gameplay A story spanning 5 visually-distinct chapters with over 100 levels! 7 brutal boss battles 4 bonus remix chapters Golf Unique music for each chapter
